price: “Govoriš li ti to ozbiljno ili se samo šališ?”, upitaše oni.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ أَمۡ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱللَّٰعِبِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū aji'tanā bil-ḥaqi am anta mina al-lāʿibīna
